mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(sum(user_week.hours),0) FROM user_week WHERE task_id = #{taskId} and user_id = #{userId} and `year` = #{year} and week_number = #{weekNumber}

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(t.`name`),0) workerNum,IFNULL(SUM(t.workHours),0) totalHours FROM (SELECT u.`name`,IFNULL(sum(uw.hours),0) workHours FROM user_week uw LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = uw.user_id LEFT JOIN user_leave ul on ul.id = uw.task_id WHERE uw.`year` = #{year} AND uw.week_number = #{weekOfYear} AND u.job_role = #{jobRole} AND ul.id IS NULL AND u.`is_delete` = 0 AND u.`status` = 0 GROUP BY u.`name`) t

SELECT u.job_role, ug.user_id, u.`name` as user_name, t1.task_id, IFNULL(t1.task_name,'暂无任务') AS task_name, IFNULL(t1.hours,0) AS work_hours, t1.`year`, t1.week_number, IFNULL(ul.leave_hours,0) AS leave_hours FROM user_group ug LEFT JOIN( SELECT u.id as user_id,u.name as user_name,t.id as task_id,t.`name` as task_name,uw.hours,uw.`year`,uw.week_number FROM user_week uw LEFT JOIN task t ON t.id = uw.task_id LEFT JOIN user u on u.id = uw.user_id WHERE `year` = #{year} AND week_number = #{weekNumber} AND u.is_delete = 0 AND u.`status` = 0 AND t.is_delete = 0 AND t.review_status = 3 ) t1 on t1.user_id = ug.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT w.user_id,IFNULL(sum(w.hours),0) AS leave_hours FROM user_week w JOIN user_leave l ON w.task_id = l.id WHERE l.review_status=3 and w.week_number = #{weekNumber} and w.year= #{year} GROUP BY w.user_id) ul ON ul.user_id = ug.user_id LEFT JOIN `user` u on u.id = ug.user_id WHERE ug.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY u.job_role,u.id;
mapper.update: update user_week SET hours = #{hours} where id = #{id}
